title: President Trump Talks About Venezuela After a Big Change
summary: President Donald Trump held a news conference to talk about a big event in Venezuela. He said that the U.S. military helped remove Nicol치s Maduro, who was the leader of Venezuela. Trump called this a success and said it showed American strength. He spoke at his Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida. Trump wants to help Venezuela become peaceful and just after many years of tough rule. He also said that American taxpayers will not have to pay for this plan. But there are challenges ahead, like making sure Venezuela stays stable and dealing with other countries that might not like what happened. This event is part of Trump's way of doing things in foreign policy, where he acts boldly.

the armed forces that protect a country
a meeting where a leader talks to reporters
a time without fighting or war
people who pay money to the government

options: Finding a new president for the U.S.

background_read: Venezuela is a country in South America that has had a lot of problems like high prices and not enough food. Nicol치s Maduro was its leader for many years, and some people did not like his rule. The United States, led by President Trump, sometimes gets involved in other countries to help make changes. A news conference is when a leader talks to reporters to share news. This article is about what Trump said after a big event in Venezuela.
Article_Structure: WHO: President Donald Trump and the U.S. military
WHAT: They helped remove Nicol치s Maduro from power in Venezuela
WHERE: At Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida and in Caracas, Venezuela
WHY: To show American strength and help Venezuela become peaceful and just

perspectives.description: Trump sees the event as a success and a display of American power, aiming to bring peace to Venezuela without costing taxpayers.
